attributes.action: Eddie Howe for next England manager
attributes.additional_details:
LMA championship manager of the year 2014-2015
LMA manager of the year 2014-2015
Bournemouth promoted to premiership 2015-2016
Football league manager of the decade award 2005-2015
attributes.background: After witnessing some very old school rookie errors in management selection and substitutions made it is time to put in charge a young intelligent football manager that has the capacity to recognise talented players and work along side them to get the most from each individual player
